const theme = {
  colors: {
    // Brand colors
    primary: '#FF4D5A',
    primaryDark: '#E63A47',
    primaryLight: '#FF7C85',
    secondary: '#5B3DF5',
    secondaryDark: '#4A30C4',
    tertiary: '#21C6F7',
    // Text colors
    text: '#FFFFFF',
    textLight: '#CCCCCC',
    textMuted: '#888888',
    // UI colors
    background: '#121212',
    darkBackground: '#0A0A0A',
    lightBackground: '#1E1E1E',
    surface: '#1A1A1A',
    surfaceHover: '#252525',
    border: '#333333',
    divider: '#2A2A2A',
    input: '#1E1E1E',
    card: '#1A1A1A',
    hover: '#252525',
    // State colors
    success: '#4BB543',
    successDark: '#3D9636',
    successLight: '#A3E9A4',
    error: '#B00020',
    errorDark: '#8B0017',
    errorLight: '#CF6679',
    errorBg: 'rgba(176, 0, 32, 0.1)',
    warning: '#FFB74D',
    info: '#29B6F6',
    disabled: '#444444',
    // Social media colors
    github: '#333333',
    linkedin: '#0077B5',
    twitter: '#1DA1F2',
    facebook: '#1877F2',
    instagram: '#E1306C'
  },
  fonts: {
    heading: "'Montserrat', sans-serif",
    body: "'Poppins', sans-serif"
  },
  breakpoints: {
    xs: '576px',
    sm: '768px',
    md: '992px',
    lg: '1200px'
  },
  transition: {
    standard: 'all 0.3s ease',
    fast: 'all 0.2s ease',
    slow: 'all 0.5s ease'
  },
  shadows: {
    small: '0 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)',
    medium: '0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',
    large: '0 10px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)',
    button: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
    card: '0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)'
  },
  gradients: {
    primary: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #FF4D5A 0%, #FF8C6B 100%)',
    secondary: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #5B3DF5 0%, #3D76F5 100%)',
    dark: 'linear-gradient(180deg, #121212 0%, #0A0A0A 100%)'
  },

    xs: '0.5rem',
    sm: '1rem',
    md: '1.5rem',

    xl: '3rem',
    xxl: '5rem'
  },
  borderRadius: {
    small: '4px',
    medium: '8px',
    large: '12px',
    round: '50%'
  },
  animation: {
    short: '0.2s',
    medium: '0.3s',
    long: '0.5s'
  },
  zIndex: {
    dropdown: 1000,
    sticky: 1020,
    fixed: 1030,
    modal: 1040,
    popover: 1050,
    tooltip: 1060
  }
};
export default theme;

sourcesContent:
const theme = {
  colors: {
    // Brand colors
    primary: '#FF4D5A',
    primaryDark: '#E63A47',
    primaryLight: '#FF7C85',
    secondary: '#5B3DF5',
    secondaryDark: '#4A30C4',
    tertiary: '#21C6F7',

    // Text colors
    text: '#FFFFFF',
    textLight: '#CCCCCC',
    textMuted: '#888888',

    // UI colors
    background: '#121212',
    darkBackground: '#0A0A0A',
    lightBackground: '#1E1E1E',
    surface: '#1A1A1A',
    surfaceHover: '#252525',
    border: '#333333',
    divider: '#2A2A2A',
    input: '#1E1E1E',
    card: '#1A1A1A',
    hover: '#252525',

    // State colors
    success: '#4BB543',
    successDark: '#3D9636',
    successLight: '#A3E9A4',
    error: '#B00020',
    errorDark: '#8B0017',
    errorLight: '#CF6679',
    errorBg: 'rgba(176, 0, 32, 0.1)',
    warning: '#FFB74D',
    info: '#29B6F6',
    disabled: '#444444',

    // Social media colors
    github: '#333333',
    linkedin: '#0077B5',
    twitter: '#1DA1F2',
    facebook: '#1877F2',
    instagram: '#E1306C'
  },
  fonts: {
    heading: "'Montserrat', sans-serif",
    body: "'Poppins', sans-serif"
  },
  breakpoints: {
    xs: '576px',
    sm: '768px',
    md: '992px',
    lg: '1200px'
  },
  transition: {
    standard: 'all 0.3s ease',
    fast: 'all 0.2s ease',
    slow: 'all 0.5s ease'
  },
  shadows: {
    small: '0 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)',
    medium: '0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',
    large: '0 10px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)',
    button: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
    card: '0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)'
  },
  gradients: {
    primary: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #FF4D5A 0%, #FF8C6B 100%)',
    secondary: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #5B3DF5 0%, #3D76F5 100%)',
    dark: 'linear-gradient(180deg, #121212 0%, #0A0A0A 100%)'
  },
  spacing: {
    xs: '0.5rem',
    sm: '1rem',
    md: '1.5rem',
    lg: '2rem',
    xl: '3rem',
    xxl: '5rem'
  },
  borderRadius: {
    small: '4px',
    medium: '8px',
    large: '12px',
    round: '50%'
  },
  animation: {
    short: '0.2s',
    medium: '0.3s',
    long: '0.5s'
  },
  zIndex: {
    dropdown: 1000,
    sticky: 1020,
    fixed: 1030,
    modal: 1040,
    popover: 1050,
    tooltip: 1060
  }
};

export default theme;
